text: haey yeung min del ban banhchoun moun anak( mou ham meat)nouv banda anakneasar na krawpi puokke( chea mnoussa thommotea) cheh ttuoltean chamneiahar ning daertam phsaar noh laey . haey yeung ban thveukear sakalbong champoh puok anak towvinhtowmk( nouv brakear la ryy akrak mean ryy kr chhu ryy chea...) . tae puok anak nung meankar atthmot der ryyte? haey mcheasa robsa anakchea anak kheunh bamphot( nouv avei teangoasa)
